sentences.sentence: You are getting more computing power per pixel.
sentences.translation: 你得到了每个像素越来越的计算能力。

sentences.sentence: Web designers are much more than pixel pushers.
sentences.translation: 网页设计师不仅仅是像素抄写员。

sentences.sentence: “He would compare them pixel by pixel to see if they matched, ” Ratzlaff said.
sentences.translation: 他会逐像素比较两者是否吻合。
